text: Pol ñɨn omɨŋal nokom mɨdɨl, Juda bɨawl man anɨb ak yelak okok kɨlop suk agak. Suk agek apnan gelak agak, Mam sɨkop. Yad binɨb chɨn okok kɨlop gɨ tɨmel ma gɨl, based apɨs sɨkop takaw agɨlak ak ma tɨbɨlɨkɨnek agak. Anɨb okok ma gɨnek ak pen, Juda bɨawl Jelusalem nɨb okok kɨli yɨp nag lɨl, dam Lom gapman bɨawl okok kɨlop ñɨlak agak.
